english.segment1: She's a liar. It comes to this. All we had 'til now is gone. And I'm the other. Piece to this. Every time I feel this inside. I don't wanna be the one who..
english.segment2: Caught you. So take cover. Never saw it comin' so you put me on again. Had you and no other. The game, the lies are getting old
english.segment3: She starts feeling on her own. She makes the city seem like home. All you had for me is gone. I give and I give. But you hope in return. Never thought I'd be the one to burn
english.segment4: Every time I feel this inside. I don't wanna be the one to. I don't wanna be the one who..
english.segment5: Caught you. So take cover. Never saw it comin' so you put me on again. Had you and no other. The game, the lies are getting old
